title: Making Quiltwork - coat of many colors

content.prompt: In context, the speaker’s allusion to “the coat of many colors” in line 1 most clearly foregrounds which idea?

choices.label: A colorful garment as an expression of an individual’s achievement
The importance of relationships between fathers and sons
The profound personal and cultural significance of material objects
The gradual transformation of a single garment’s meaning over time

skill.text: Skill 6.D: Identify and explain the function of an allusion.
